entry.title: å›¾ç‰‡åŠ è½½æµ‹è¯•
Hello World
entry.content:
Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
